GK19gp12-22u:4572_2: anugavam āsādita-dṛṣṭi-vrajaṃ śrīmad-vrajam avāpya nija-viraha-dahanaṃ nirvāpya svaka-rūpāmṛtenāpyāyayāmāsa /
GK19gp12-22u:4573: [61] sakhāyas tu yājñikeṣu jagmivāṃso jakṣivāṃsaś ca vayam iti saṅkocena na kañcid apy ūcivāṃsaś ca /
GK19gp12-22u:4577: ākarṣaṇād guṇā yasya sarvān anuguṇān vyadhuḥ //JGc_1,22.46//
